attributes.action: Crack down on Benefit Fraud in Wakefield - In particular Alverthorpe/Wrenthorpe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is an increasing amount of suspicious characters in this area of Wakefield, and there is a seemingly obvious percentage of people living here who seem to be taking advantage of the benefit system, I would like this area to be investigated in attempt to make sure there are no fraudulant individuals living here.
